str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From the same as hesuchios; to keep still, i.e. Refrain from labor, meddlesomeness or speech.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
